numericalExperiment.rationale: Aqua-planet : cloud response to an imposed 4xCO2 (Hansen-style diagnosis).
numericalExperiment.description: Consistent with CFMIP requirements, impose a 4xCO2 on zonally uniform SSTs of expt. 6.7a (which is the control for this run).
